data.name: Half-Life 2
data.detailed_description: 1998., . Half-Life sends a shock through the game industry with its combination of pounding action and continuous, immersive storytelling.
data.about_the_game: 1998. HALF-LIFE sends a shock through the game industry with its combination of pounding action and continuous, immersive storytelling. Valve's debut title wins more than 50 game-of-the-year awards on its way to being named 'Best PC Game Ever' by PC Gamer, and game critics hail its revolutionary gameplay.
